text: Kwavija ndagizi zilonga, “sambiutende ugoni, sambiukome, sambiwibe, sambiusulukile vinhu va miyago,”13:9 Mbuli zino zolawa mkitabu cha KUHALAWA 2:13-15, 17; NG'HUMBUKILA YA TOLATI 5:17-19, 21. na ndagizi zose ziyagwe za hasi ya ndagizi ino imwe ilonga, “Mnogele munhu wa habehi nagwe kamba vukiinogela mwenyego.”13:9 Mbuli zino zolawa mkitabu cha MBULI ZA WALAWI 19:18.
